TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceUrlGenerator

summary.span: 定义一个方法，设计器宿主必须实现该方法来为嵌入式资源提供 URL 引用查找。

span.span: Defines the method that a designer-host must implement to provide URL reference look-up for embedded resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 版本2.0 提供了从控件（如控件）的程序集检索嵌入资源的功能。ASP.NET version 2.0 provides the ability to retrieve embedded resources from an assembly for controls, such as the control. 在运行时，可以使用 类的方法检索嵌入资源的 URL。At run time, the URL to the embedded resource can be retrieved using the method of the class. 为了提供从程序集生成资源 URL 的设计时方法，设计器宿主可以提供实现接口的服务。To provide a design-time means for generating a resource URL from an assembly, designer hosts can offer a service that implements the interface. 更多相关信息：For more information: - 有关使用本地化资源的资源，请参阅[ASP.NET 网页资源概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。On using resources in localization, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). - 使用嵌入的资源时，请参阅[笔尖：如何：在 Web 服务器控件中使用资源设置属性值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb)和[如何：以编程方式检索资源值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28)。On using embedded resources, see [NIB:How to: Use Resources to Set Property Values in Web Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb) and [How to: Retrieve Resource Values Programmatically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28). - 在控件设计器上，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件设计器概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wxh45wzs(v=vs.100))。On control designers, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wxh45wzs(v=vs.100)). 接口有一个方法，该方法返回给定资源类型和名称的对资源的 URL 引用。 The interface has one method, the method, that returns a URL reference to a resource given the resource type and name.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetResourceUrl (Type type, string resourceName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetResourceUrl(class System.Type type, string resourceName) cil managed
public: System::String ^ GetResourceUrl(Type ^ type, System::String ^ resourceName);
abstract member GetResourceUrl : Type * string -> string

param.name: type
param.span: 包含嵌入式资源的程序集中的类型。

span.span: The type in the assembly that contains the embedded resource.
The name of the resource to retrieve.

summary.span: 返回对嵌入式资源（位于在设计时使用的程序集中）的 URL 引用。

span.span: Returns a URL reference to an embedded resource in an assembly that is used at design time.

returns.span: 对资源的 URL 引用。

span.span: The URL reference to the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时， 方法返回资源的 URL。At run time, the method returns a URL to a resource. 类定义用于加载嵌入资源的 HTTP 处理程序。The class defines the HTTP handler that is used to load embedded resources. 在设计时， 类的方法检测设计模式并委托给设计器宿主服务实现，该实现返回 URL。At design time, the method of the class detects design mode and delegates to the designer-host service implementation, which returns a URL.
